# JSONDecoder.NonConformingFloatDecodingStrategy.throw

**Case**

The strategy that throws an error upon decoding an exceptional floating-point value.

## Declaration

```swift
case `throw`
```

## Exceptional Values

- **JSONDecoder.NonConformingFloatDecodingStrategy.convertFromString(positiveInfinity:negativeInfinity:nan:)**: The strategy that decodes exceptional floating-point values from a specified string representation.

items.description: The strategy that decodes exceptional floating-point values from a specified string representation.
items.name: JSONDecoder.NonConformingFloatDecodingStrategy.convertFromString(positiveInfinity:negativeInfinity:nan:)
